jrds
Class Probe

java.lang.Object
  jrds.Probe
All Implemented Interfaces:
Comparable
Direct Known Subclasses:
ExternalCmdProbe, HttpProbe, JdbcProbe, MuninsProbe, SnmpProbe
public abstract class Probe
extends Object
implements Comparable

A abstract class that needs to be derived for specific probe
the derived class must construct a ProbeDesc and can overid some method as needed

Author:
Fabrice Bacchella

getNewSampleValues

public abstract Map getNewSampleValues()
The method that return a map of data to be stored the key is the datastore name. A key not associated with an existent datastore will generate a warning but will not prevent the other values to be stored.
the value must be a java.lang.Number

Returns:
the map of values
